question:
Which of the following foreign travelers give valuable accounts on the socio-economic conditions of the Vijayanagar kingdom?
1) Ibn Batuta
2) Venetian Nicolo de Conti
3) Abdur Razzak
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Many foreign travelers who visited the Indian subcontinent gave valuable accounts on the socio-economic conditions of the Vijayanagar kingdom. This includes the Moroccan Ibn Batuta, Venetian Nicolo de Conti, Persian Abdur Razzak, and the Portuguese Domingo Paes.
